title: 820-00045 does not recognise SSD
message:
goog afternoon, could you give me some guidance in that case? 
I don't know where to start, there are no signs of oxidation, sometimes you recognize the ssd.

title: 820-00045 does not recognise SSD
message:
We have several post about this issue on A1534.
Usually internal problem on CPU, or broken solder balls underneath.
Some videos reflowing CPU available on Internet.
Unfortunately that is not a serious solution :(-

title: 820-00045 does not recognise SSD
message: if I reflow on the CPU will I get a solution ?

title: 820-00045 does not recognise SSD
message:
"Unfortunately that is not a serious solution :(- "
You can try it on your risk.
Be aware, speak with the client first; you can get a completely dead board!

Some people say on Internet they had success puting entire board on IR oven.
Possibly someone already tried with pizza oven...
